sentences.en: ...the restaurant owner's business associates.
sentences.cn: …该餐馆老板的商业伙伴们。

sentences.en: Don't associate with dishonest boys.
sentences.cn: 不要和不诚实的孩子结交.

sentences.en: Don't associate with such people.
sentences.cn: 勿与此辈来往.

sentences.en: Dr. Smith was moved up from an associate to a full professorship.
sentences.cn: 史密斯博士由副教授晋升为正教授.

sentences.en: Foreigners always associate China with the Great Wall.
sentences.cn: 外国人总是把中国和长城联系在一起.

sentences.en: He will remain affiliated with the firm as a special associate director.
sentences.cn: 他将作为特别副经理继续为该公司工作。

sentences.en: I always associate that song with my visit to Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 听到那支歌我就会联想到我的夏威夷之行.

sentences.en: I always associate the smell of baking with my childhood.
sentences.cn: 一闻到烘烤食物的味道我就想起了童年。

sentences.en: I always associate the smell of those flowers with my childhood.
sentences.cn: 我一闻到这种花香,就联想起我的童年.

sentences.en: I don't associate the two ideas.
sentences.cn: 这两个概念我联系不起来.

sentences.en: I don’t like these layabouts you’re associating with.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢你结交的这些游手好闲的人。

sentences.en: I haven't been associated with the project over the last year.
sentences.cn: 我过去一年不曾跟这个项目有关联。

sentences.en: Mother warned the boys not to associate with bad companions.
sentences.cn: 母亲告诫孩子们别和坏人交往.

sentences.en: Mr Lin is associate director of the Institute.
sentences.cn: 林先生是研究所的副所长。

sentences.en: Mr. Lin is associate director of the Institute.
sentences.cn: 林先生是该研究所的副主任。

sentences.en: Never associate with bad companions.
sentences.cn: 别和坏人结交.

sentences.en: one of his business associates
sentences.cn: 他的一个生意伙伴

sentences.en: She applied for associate membership last year.
sentences.cn: 她去年申请成为准会员。

sentences.en: The oblique rays of the sun on the orchards create this typical landscape that traditional iconography would associate with an earthly paradise.
sentences.cn: 阳光撒在果园里形成了独特的景致,就像传统肖像画中描绘的天堂.

sentences.en: Through science we've got the idea of associating progress with the future.
sentences.cn: 通过科学我们已有了将进步与未来联系起来的观念。

sentences.en: We associate China with the Great Wall.
sentences.cn: 我们想起中国,就联想到长城.

sentences.en: When bad men combine,good men must associate.
sentences.cn: 当坏人朋比为奸时，好人应该联合起来。

words.tran_cn: 为准会员；准社员的职位
协会，联盟，社团；联合；联想
联想心理学；观念联合论
联系（associate的过去式和过去分词）
联想；使联合；使发生联系

phrases.tran_cn: n. 美国大学修满二年课程的肄业证书
副主任，副总监；副董事；联席董事；副导演
副学士（修满两年大学课程）
v. 联合；与…联系在一起；和…来往

trans.tran_en: Associate is used before a rank or title to indicate a slightly different or lower rank or title
someone who you work or do business with

trans.tran_cn: 联想，联系，使与（某个组织、事业或观点）有关系，公开支持，与…交往
trans.tran_en: to spend time with someone, especially someone that other people disapprove of
to spend time with someone, especially someone that other people disapprove of

trans.tran_cn: 把…联系在一起；使联合，使有联系
trans.tran_en: to make a connection in your mind between one thing or person and another
